data.eml:eml: Molecular phylogeny of the weevil genus Dichromacalles Stüben (Curculionidae: Cryptorhynchinae) and description of a new species

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Stüben, Peter E., Schütte, André, Astrin, Jonas J. (2013): Molecular phylogeny of the weevil genus Dichromacalles Stüben (Curculionidae: Cryptorhynchinae) and description of a new species. Zootaxa 3718 (2): 101-127, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3718.2.1
